metadata.title: RZ/G2L, RZ/G3S: How to increase Flash Writer transfer speed

sections.content:
Question:
I am using Flash Writer with the Evaluation Board Kit connected to a PC via SCIF.
Is there a way to increase the Flash Writer transfer speed from 115200 bps?
Answer:
It is possible to change the default (115200 bps) to a higher speed (921600 bps) using the "SUP" command.
For detailed instructions, see "2.1.2.4. Writing the Bootloader" in the following document.
RZ/G2L
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/qsg/rzg2l-evaluation-board-kit-quick-start-guide?r=1518686
RZ/G3S
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/gde/rzg3s-evaluation-board-kit-quick-start-guide?r=25458596
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L, RZ/G3S
